sentence.Network_en: The essence of archaic religiosity is the scapegoat mechanism.
sentence.Network_cn: 古代宗教狂热的本质,就是代罪羔羊的机制.

sentence.Network_en: Despite globalisation and technology, I predict a steady rise of religiosity worldwide.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管现如今存在全球化和科技, 但是我预言全球性笃信宗教将稳步抬头.

sentence.Network_en: It's not all mystical New Age spiritualism , or even overt religiosity.
sentence.Network_cn: 这不全然是新时代的神秘唯心论或甚至宗教狂热.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 宗教狂（religiosity） 在他们的看法中，认为藉用人工的方法和一些特别热切的祈祷和宗教仪式一样，能使自己和上帝更靠近，也就是 …
2.1 宗教性（Religiosity）的概念及测量11-262.2 宗教性与自尊的关系26-27 3 本研究的内容与意义27-29 3.1 研究内容27-28 3.2 选题意.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(R) -亿城英语 ... religiose 信教的 religiosity 虔诚 religious 虔诚的.
就宗教社会学的理论视角而言，一个人的宗教信仰(religiosity)一般会包括信仰(believing)、归属(be longing)与行为(behaving)等若干.

list.abs: so the shunryu experience seems to be that which frees us from religiosity and leads us to true spirituality .因此，对空性的体验，似乎是那能将我们自宗教狂信中解脱、引领我们至真实精神性之道。
The essence of archaic religiosity is the scapegoat mechanism ., 古代宗教狂热的本质 , 就是代罪羔羊的机制.
Americans , for all their overt religiosity , have dedicated their civilisation to proving Job wrong ., 美国人用他们公开的虔诚来创造他们的文明 , 来证明约伯是错误的.

entry.def: If you refer to a person's religiosity, you are referring to the fact that they are religious in a way which seems exaggerated and insincere.

example.tran: 他们对宗教虚伪的虔诚

means.word_mean: 1. exaggerated or affected piety and religious zeal

auth_sentence.content: Jesse did some really good evolutionary studies on religiosity!

auth_sentence.content: Religiosity apparently has genetic basis, but not religion.

auth_sentence.content: Statistically, religiosity independently predicts number of offspring born to mothers.
